title: Verify Source of Wealth for Large Deposit
description: A client makes a large, unusual deposit, triggering a requirement to verify the source of the wealth.

tasks.description: Contact the client to inquire about the source of the large deposit.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent securely contacts the client, who states the funds are from the sale of a property.

tasks.description: Request supporting documentation for the stated source of wealth (e.g., property sale agreement).
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent requests the specific documentation needed for verification.

tasks.description: Review the provided documentation and approve the transaction.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent reviews the sale agreement, finds it satisfactory, and adds a note to the client's file clearing the deposit.
